title: Looking for some cheap T206 cards featuring Cleveland players
author: joshvox

posts.post_title: Looking for some cheap T206 cards featuring Cleveland players
posts.post_content:
Hey all,
Getting started putting together a T206 Cleveland set. Recently had a birthday and got $50 spending money--so I'd like to buy a low grade card (or cards) to get my set going. I'm just starting, so I need just about every card--drop me a PM if you have some to sell that fit this description--I'd like scans/pics if possible. Thanks!

Hi Josh
 
I will be sending you a PM shortly.


Jantz
Thanks for the PMs everybody. I'm tapped out for now, but I'll bump this thread up when I'm ready to buy again.
